Bruce Hornsby’s new live album is $3.99 today only at Amazon MP3! – Addicted To Vinyl
s: Bride of the Noisemakers, the new live album by Bruce Hornsby & The Noisemakers is available today at Amazon MP3 for a special one day only price of $3.99 which is a helluva deal for nearly three hours of live Hornsby. Bride will be an Amazon exclusive release on both CD and MP3 for the entire month of May (and also is on sale at Hornsby’s shows) before becoming available at traditional outlets in June. t: Bruce Hornsby - Wikipedia
s: 2 weeks ago - Hornsby has won three Grammy Awards: a 1987 Grammy Award for Best New Artist with Bruce Hornsby and the Range, a 1990 Grammy Award for Best Bluegrass Recording, and a 1994 Grammy Award for Best Pop Instrumental Performance.
